mention.text: reporters that in his view private Russian companies should follow suit
those who support Putin s ideas but choose not to join the United Russia party
those who had access to state secrets
the Defence Ministry , Interior Ministry and several state law enforcement agencies
a ban on employees going on vacations abroad
countries that have valid extradition agreements with the United States
